subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text: {{Han simp|瑩|f=𤇾|t=𫇦}} based on section 3 of the 1956 {{w|Chinese Character Simplification Scheme}} {{w2|zh|pref=《|漢字簡化方案|suf=》}}, where  {{l|zh|𤇾}} is listed as one of the 54 radical components to be simplified. <!-- Refer https://zh.wikisource.org/wiki/漢字簡化方案 -->
